statements: SELECT * FROM population_health_data ORDER BY age ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT patient_id, age, gender FROM population_health_data WHERE city='New York'
SELECT * FROM population_health_data WHERE chronic_disease='Diabetes' ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT age, COUNT(*) FROM population_health_data GROUP BY age ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC
SELECT city, COUNT(*) FROM population_health_data GROUP BY city HAVING COUNT(*) >= 2
SELECT * FROM population_health_data WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_id, city FROM population_health_data WHERE gender = 'Female' AND chronic_disease = 'Diabetes' ORDER BY city ASC;
SELECT patient_id, age, city FROM population_health_data WHERE city IN ('New York', 'Los Angeles', 'Chicago') ORDER BY age DESC, city ASC;
SELECT COUNT(patient_id) AS total_patients, AVG(age) AS average_age FROM population_health_data WHERE chronic_disease IS NOT NULL;
SELECT patient_id, age, gender, city, chronic_disease FROM population_health_data WHERE age BETWEEN 30 AND 60 AND gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age ASC, city DESC;
SELECT * FROM population_health_data WHERE age > 30
SELECT patient_name, age FROM population_health_data WHERE gender = 'Male'
SELECT id, patient_name, gender FROM population_health_data WHERE chronic_disease = TRUE
SELECT patient_name, age FROM population_health_data ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT * FROM disease_prevalence WHERE prevalence_rate > 0.05
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM population_health_data WHERE age > 50
SELECT * FROM population_health_data WHERE gender = 'Male' AND chronic_disease = True

SELECT patient_name, disease_name, prevalence_rate FROM population_health_data JOIN disease_prevalence ON population_health_data.age > 60 AND population_health_data.chronic_disease = True AND population_health_data.id = disease_prevalence.disease_id
SELECT id, patient_name, age, prevalence_rate FROM population_health_data JOIN disease_prevalence ON population_health_data.id = disease_prevalence.disease_id
SELECT * FROM population_health_data ORDER BY age DESC, gender ASC
SELECT * FROM ChronicDiseaseData;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM ChronicDiseaseData WHERE diagnosis = 'Diabetes';
SELECT patient_id, diagnosis_date FROM ChronicDiseaseData WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY diagnosis_date DESC;
SELECT risk_factor_name, description FROM RiskFactors;
SELECT indicator_name, category, value FROM HealthIndicators WHERE category = 'Blood Pressure' ORDER BY value DESC;
SELECT * FROM ChronicDiseaseData ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, diagnosis_date FROM ChronicDiseaseData WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, diagnosis, diagnosis_date FROM ChronicDiseaseData WHERE age > 50;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender, diagnosis, diagnosis_date FROM ChronicDiseaseData WHERE diagnosis_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age, gender, diagnosis FROM ChronicDiseaseData JOIN HealthIndicators ON ChronicDiseaseData.patient_id = HealthIndicators.indicator_id;
SELECT * FROM populations ORDER BY country ASC;
SELECT country, population_size FROM populations WHERE average_age > 30;
SELECT disease_name, prevalence_rate, affected_population FROM diseases WHERE prevalence_rate > 0.05;
SELECT * FROM risk_factors WHERE description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT disease_name, risk_factor_name FROM diseases JOIN disease_mappings ON diseases.id = disease_mappings.disease_id JOIN risk_factors ON disease_mappings.risk_factor_id = risk_factors.id;
SELECT * FROM populations ORDER BY country DESC, population_size ASC;
SELECT country, population_size FROM populations WHERE average_age > 30;
SELECT disease_name, prevalence_rate, affected_population FROM diseases WHERE prevalence_rate >= 0.05 ORDER BY disease_name ASC;
SELECT risk_factor_name, description FROM risk_factors WHERE description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT d.disease_name, r.risk_factor_name FROM diseases d INNER JOIN disease_mappings dm ON d.id = dm.disease_id INNER JOIN risk_factors r ON r.id = dm.risk_factor_id;
SELECT id, age, gender, location FROM demographics WHERE age > 30
SELECT id, disease_name, diagnosis_date FROM medical_history ORDER BY diagnosis_date DESC
SELECT patient_id, risk_factor, risk_level FROM risk_factors WHERE risk_level = 'High'
SELECT id, medication_name, dosage, frequency FROM medications WHERE patient_id = 101
SELECT patient_id, appointment_date, doctor_id FROM appointments WHERE doctor_id = 5
SELECT id, age, gender, location, income FROM demographics WHERE age > 30
SELECT patient_id, disease_name, diagnosis_date FROM medical_history WHERE patient_id = 1001 ORDER BY diagnosis_date DESC
SELECT patient_id, medication_name, dosage, frequency FROM medications WHERE frequency = 'daily' ORDER BY medication_name ASC
SELECT patient_id, risk_factor, risk_level FROM risk_factors WHERE risk_level = 'high'
SELECT id, appointment_date, doctor_id, notes FROM appointments WHERE doctor_id = 2002
